vlive.korean: 왜 보험인데 왜! Why! It's insurance! Why! 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스! 다녀왔어요 퇴근길인가요?
그... 마법 보험 계약서? Is it because of the magic insurance contract? 듣기 View video 대나무숲TV (BAMBOONETWORK) : 안녕, 마녀상점 [웹드라마_어서오세요, 마녀상점] - EP.12(최종화)
vlive.english: Is it because of the magic insurance contract?

vlive.korean: 뭐? - 지금 이 상황에서 당신이 보험금을 타낼 수 있을 거라고 생각해? What? - You think you can get insurance money at this kind of situation? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [목숨값] Ep09 나 때문에 싸우는 두 남자
vlive.english: What? - You think you can get insurance money at this kind of situation?

vlive.korean: '치아보험 들었죠?' "You have dental insurance, right?" 듣기 View video YOON JISUNG : 달콤하지룽🍬
보험을 꼭 들기를 바라겠습니다. that costs 20,000 to 30,000 won. 듣기 View video KIM DONG WAN : 1010클럽with제시, 한라

examples.korean: You’re not insured to drive our car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 우리 차를 운전하는 것은 보험에 포함이 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re not insured to drive our car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company branched out into selling insurance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 회사가 보험 판매 분야로 새로 진출했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company branched out into selling insurance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Check the list of exclusions in the insurance policy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 보험 약관에서 제외 사항의 리스트를 확인해 보라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Check the list of exclusions in the insurance policy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The insurance policy covers all baggage and personal effects. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 보험 약관은 모든 수하물과 소지품을 포괄한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The insurance policy covers all baggage and personal effects. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Luckily he had insured himself against long-term illness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다행히 그가 장기 질환에 대비한 보험을 들어 둔 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Luckily he had insured himself against long-term illness. Add to Wordbook
